dct_alternative_sm: Syria (south division) including Palestine & the Hauran
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Geographical miles" and "English miles".
Includes legend: Arabic terms used in the map.
"No. XL" -- top left corner. "No. XLI" -- top right corner.
Shows topography, drainage, roads and travel routes, places of historical interest.
